title: Pitcher, late 19th–early 20th century
description: Open pitcher, tapering somewhat toward bottom, resting on three chunky feet. Glazed cloud and dragon reliefs scattered over stippled surface. Inside glazed turquoise. Handle in shape of a dragon clinging to side of pitcher. Spout cracked. Dragon handle broken, repaired with plaster and broken again.

tombstone.epitaph: Pitcher, late 19th–early 20th century.earthenware, partly glazed, moulded. 1958-15-1.
